entry.title: 19" Tall | 3 Tier Rustic Cupcake Stand, Natural Wooden Cake Stand Dessert Display With Metal Pole
entry.summary:

Type: Cake Stands
Price: 29.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cake Stand + 1 Bag Of Tools
Material: Wood | Metal
Wood Color: Natural 
Metal Pole Color: Black
Style: 3 Tier Wooden Cupcake Stand w/ Metal Poles
Overall Size: 19.5"H x 13.5" Dia.
Small Wooden Plate Size: 7.5" Dia.
Medium Wooden Plate Size: 9" Dia.
Large Wooden Plate Size: 13.5" Dia.
Wooden Plate Thickness: 1"
Metal Pole Size: 17"L x 3" Dia.

Bag Of Tools Includes:

  • 5 Nails (4x Flat, 1x Sharp-- Only 1 is needed to secure the middle plate)
  • 1 Screw Driver
    		•
    Assembly Required: Yes
    Features: Lightweight, Easy to Assemble
    Great for serving meats, cakes, cupcakes, cheese, crackers, and hors d'oeuvres
    Wooden Plate Size Diameter may vary because the wood is Natural
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]


    Additional Information:

    • Each Flat/Sharp Nail Length: 0.75"
    • Each Flat/Sharp Nail Top Diameter: 1cm
    • Each Flat/Sharp Nail Bottom Diameter: 0.5cm
    • Screw Driver Size: 2.5"L x 1"W x 0.5cm Thickness
    • Tips for Assembly:
      • Medium Wooden Plate is inserted into the Pole and uses 1x Sharp-Tipped Nail to secure it.
      • Medium Wooden Plate has no Pre-Drilled Holes. Use the 1x Sharp-Tipped Nail provided to easily drill a hole and secure the Plate
      • Small Wooden Plate that goes on the Top-Most Tier is screwed on
    • Instruction Manual Not Included
    • Note: These are Hand Made. Variations in size, shape, color, and clarity are expected. Natural marking or blemishes are common.
    • Uses : Wedding. Party, Anniversary, Birthday Cake Decoration

entry.title: 2 Pack | Mirror Charger Plates, 13" Glass Charger Plates With Large Pearl Beaded Rim - Silver
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4710
Type: Decorations
Price: 27.99 - 149.99 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 2 Charger Plates
Material: Glass | Metal
Color: Silver
Style: Round Charger w/Pearl Beaded Rim
Total Diameter: 13"
Inner Diameter: 11.5"
Glass Thickness: 5mm
Rim Diameter: 0.75"
Plate Thickness: 0.25"
Pearl Size: 0.75"Dia x 0.5" Thickness
Total Pearls: 49
Pearl Crystals are made of Glass
Bottom has 4 pegs to prevent slipping
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Mirror Glass Charger Plates

Impart a luxe look of posh partyscape to your plain tables with our pearl accented modish mirror glass charger plates. Blending peerless beauty of lustrous pearls with glistening glass surface, these charming chargers will take the elegance of your party tables into the level of royal banquets. Exuding shine and sparkle, this dazzling darling will make an ornate addition to wedding receptions, anniversaries, birthday parties, and other festive events.

Beaded Pearl Rim

Intricately handcrafted by our master artisans with special attention to refine construction, this posh pearl embellished charger is made from delicate, yet heavy duty glass for an upscale look and feel. With glistening reflective surface, this beauty will bounce back lighting, creating an exotic effect at any occasion. Four pegs in base help in keeping the chargers in place by avoiding slipping. With 13" diameter, these charming chargers are spacious enough to accommodate our 10" Dinner Plates and 7" Salad/Dessert Plates to create a table that combines style, sophistication, and convenience.

  

Stylish and Versatile

Gorgeous in appearance and versatile in application, you can use this pearled plate with your premium dinnerware as a charger plate, or create dazzling wedding centerpieces, candle arrangements, and floral decorations by placing crystal or metal vases, chandeliers, candelabras etc. Flaunt your celebratory cakes and desserts in the most awe-inspiring manner by placing atop this jeweled platter. Perfect to be presented to your loved ones as a heart-touching wedding gift, birthday or anniversary gift, and as a posh and practical housewarming gift.

 

Additional Information:

  • Total Pegs: 4
  • Peg Diameter: 0.5"
  • Peg Thickness: 2mm
  • How to Care: Use soft cloth to clean and dry. Not suitable for microwave and dishwasher.
  • Sale is for Charger Plates only, other decorative accessories not included.
  • Uses: Formal Dinner Parties, Holiday Gatherings, Weddings, Bridal & Baby Showers, Upscale Events & Other Celebrations
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

Mirror Glass Charger Plates

For tables that call for extra bling and beauty, our latest Diamond Embellished Mirror Glass Charger Plates are an epitome of style and sparkle. Boasting luxurious glass construction with ravishing reflective mirror surface and ornate accents of bedazzling beveled diamond crystals around the rims, these bejeweled beauties are ideal for adding an oomph factor into your wedding, party, birthday, and special event tablescape, or for adding a touch of luxe luxury to your daily living.

Beaded Rim Design

With 13" diameter, these charming chargers are spacious enough to accommodate our 10" Dinner Plates and 7" Salad/Dessert Plates to create a table with a mix of patterns and finishes that will surely leave your guests deeply inspired. Four pegs in base help in keeping the chargers inplace by avoiding slipping. Glossy luster of mirror glass surface glamorized by rhinestone crystal beaded border make this glorious piece an ideal decorative accessory to gorgeously accentuate your tableware, centerpieces, cake dishes, flower arrangements, and candle displays.

  

Stylish and Versatile

Combining lustrous gloss of reflective mirror surface with seamless sparkle of charismatic crystals, these Upscale Charger Plates are highly versatile and multipurpose. Perfect to augment the sophistication of your tablescapes, these dazzling darlings also second as charismatic centerpiece risers and cake stands, or for candle display, flower arrangements and even makeup display. Pair with our crystal and rhinestone accented glassware, flatware, stemware, and centerpieces for creating an enchanting display of shine and sparkle!

  • Quantity: 2 Charger Plates
  • Material: Glass & Acrylic
  • Color: Silver
  • Overall Diameter: 13"
  • Inner Diameter: 9.5"
  • Plate Thickness: 0.25"
  • Crystal Diamond Size: 2"L x 1"W
  • Crystal Diamond Thickness: 0.5"
  • Total # of Diamonds: 25
  • Peg Diameter: 0.5"
  • Peg Thickness: 2mm
  • Total # Of Pegs: 4 Notes
  • Bottom has 4 pegs to prevent slipping
  • Crystal Diamond Rim provides a unique, designer appearance
  • Uses: banquet, wedding, receptions, anniversaries, birthday parties, and other festive events.
  • Note: Sale is for Charger Plates only, other decorative accessories not included.
    For decorative purposes only. Not for direct food contact.
How to Care:
  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

[Information]Top off any table with elegance and class with our amazing range of Baroque Charger Plates. Crafted from high grade, premium quality clear glass and tastefully accented with shimmering gold spray pattern on the rims, this dazzling darling will elevate your dinner and banquet tables manifold.

Combining sophisticated simplicity of crystal clear glass with the lush luxury of glitzy gold sheen, these charger plates not only add a dash of regal flair into your tablescape but are completely practical as well!

For a truly exotic display, pair these glam pieces with our clear and gold tableware and flatware range, satin napkins, and gold napkin rings, complemented by our clear glass and metallic gold centerpieces

Note:

  • Sale is for Charger Plates only, other decorative accessories not included.
  • Easy to wash simply wash under hot rinsing water. These plates are not microwave or dishwasher friendly.
  • Perfect for receptions, banquets, and other formal catered events

How to Care:

  • Prior to first use, glass pieces should be hand washed individually in warm soapy water, rinsed thoroughly and dried with a lint free cloth.
  • For optimal finish & clarity, clean with a 50/50 solution of vinegar and water, let stand for a few hours then rinse well and dry with a lint free cloth.
  • Our glass is produced overseas in extremely large quantities for our wholesale customers, due to transit and mass storage, all vases should be cleaned before use to remove any accumulated dust/dirt.
  • Glass pieces should not be cleaned in a dish washer. Do not use products in microwaves or conventional ovens.

[Information]

Flaunting ethereal earthy feel and whimsical woodsy charm, this rectangular wood slices will be the focal point of any place setting and party space. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, this piece of wood will open the doors of decoration and designing to all avid event planners and party makers who give extra value to natural elements. Crafted from all natural poplar wood and cut into unique size slices, the genuineness of these wood slabs is evident from natural blemishes and cracks that only add to their authenticity.

Easy to use and decorate, these wood slabs are sturdy enough to withstand weighty embellishments, as well as lightweight enough to assist in convenient mobility. Let your creativity run wild and create most amazing centerpieces by combining candles, succulents, and flowers, or bring a natural rustic twist to your dining experience by placing your tableware and dishware on these beauties, give your cakes and cupcakes an outdoorsy elegance by displaying atop these wood slabs, the possibilities are limitless when it comes to accenting with our decorative wooden pieces!
